description: unique participant ID adapted from F089 ID "-A" and "-B" used to distinguish between participants with same F089 ID, participants with missing F089 data given name missingF089_##
unique tube label sent to TGen
used date_specimenCollection to identify first specimen, chose the specimen with greater coverage estimate for specimens collected on the same day
Additional Notes: 1=first specimen provided by participant or specimen with greatest coveragte estimate if same day, 0=follow-up specimens provided by participant

description: participant gender from the Form 06
Additional Notes: 1 = male, 2 = female

description: age of individual from the Form 089

specimen collection date adapted from F06 specimen collection date; shipment no. 2 F06 specimen collection dates provided in both MDY and DMY format; where not obvious, used 1) constraint that dates had to be before Jul-31-2019 (final date in shipment no. 3), 2) used distance from F089 specimen collection date to decide whether F06 date was provided in MDY or DMY, 3) where none of the above could clarify, assumed MDY format
MDR phenotype determined by results of drug-sensitivity testing on MGIT or LJ culture
Additional Notes: 1=MDR by MGIT OR LJ, 0 = not MDR by MGIT AND LJ, NA=unable to determine MDR by MGIT AND LJ

description: MDR phenotype determined by results of WGS
Additional Notes: 1=MDR, 0 = not MDR

description: Town/village name of participant residence from the Form 089 (Form 06 if Form 089 address is missing)
Region name of participant residence from the Form 089 (Form 06 if Form 089 address is missing)
Region name + two white spaces + town/village name of participant residence from the Form 089 (Form 06 if Form 089 address is missing)
Longitude of centroid of town/village of participant residence (regiuneDenumire), primarily from ESRI geolocator
Latitude of centroid of town/village of participant residence (regiuneDenumire), primarily from ESRI geolocator
whether an individual has resided outside of moldova more than 3 months in past year from the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data

description: diagnosis date for current case of active/relapsed disease from the Form 089
Additional Notes: discrepancies exist b/w this and other dates

description: case type from the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1 = new case, 2 = relapse, 3 = return from default, 4 = treatment failure, 5 = chronic, 6 = initiated treatment abroad, 21 = SSM negtive relapse, 22 = extrapulmonary relapse

description: main localization of disease from the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1 = pulmonary; 2-13 are extrapulmonary: 2=tracheobronchitis/larynx, 3=pleura, 4= intrathoracic lymph nodes, 5=peripheral lymph nodes, 6=osteoarticular (spondylitis), 7=osteoarticular (other locations), 8=CNS (meningitis), 9=SN (other locations), 10=urogenital, 11=generalized, 12=gastrointestinal tract, 13=other forms

description: secondary localization of disease; many missing values from the Form 089L
Additional Notes: 1 = pulmonary, 2 - 13 are extrapulmonary forms

description: start date of previous tuberculosis treatment from the Form 089
Additional Notes: discrepancies exist b/w this and other dates

description: initiated treatment from the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1 = yes, 2 = postmortem, 41 = temporarily left, 42 = emigrated, 43 = other

description: current treatment start date from the Form 089
Additional Notes: discrepancies exist b/w this and other dates

description: by whom the individual was refered to TB specialist from the Form 089L
Additional Notes: 71 = GP, with symptoms, 72 = GP, prophylactic control, 81 = other specialist, symptomatic, 82 = other specialist, prophylactic control, 2 = no referral, 9 = control at penitentiary arrival

description: whether an individual was hospitalized for their TB from the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data

description: results of smear microscopy from the Form 06
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data

description: microscopy degree of positivty from the Form 06
culture degree of positivity from the Form 06
Xpert results from the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=positive, 0=negative, NA=missing data

description: rifampacin drug sensitivity results Xpert the Form 089
Additional Notes: S = sensitive, R = resistant, NA=missing data

description: specialized institution under which patient received care the Form 089
whether the individual resides in an urban area the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data

description: whether the individual resides is homeless the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data

description: occuption the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1 = employed, 2 = disabled, 3 = retired, 4 = student, 5 = unemployed

description: whether the individual receives monetary assistance the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data

description: individual's education level the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1 = primary, 2 = secondary, 3 = specialized secondary, 4 = higher education, 5 = no education

description: the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=satisfactory, 0=unsatisfactory, NA=missing data

description: whether the individual was previously incarcerated; this does NOT mean that the individual was a prisoner at the time of study the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1 = yes, 0 = no, NA=missing data

description: number of household contacts the Form 089
number of household contacts under 18 the Form 089
whether the case occurred in a hotspot the Form 089
Additional Notes: 1=yes, 0=no, NA=missing data
